snippet.title: GNILLEY presentation at Game Jam Sydney
snippet.description:
Part of my demonstration of the game I built during Game Jam Sydney 2010 at the Powerhouse Museum. Originally supposed to be a game about pitch and colour, instead it became all about yelling at everything.

Ended up scoring the Most Original award.

Get the game via my site: http://www.klikscene.com
Or here: http://www.globalgamejam.org/2010/gnilley
And follow me at http://twitter.com/TheRadix

I'm the guy in the beard, not the guy in the hat.
